characters: Driver of a white sedan, driver of a white SUV, driver of a blue truck, motorcyclist
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a busy urban road. The white sedan and white SUV are moving closely ahead, while a blue truck is on the left side. A motorcyclist appears on the right side, moving forward. The traffic is dense, and the vehicles are closely packed.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a steady speed, keeping a safe distance from the vehicles ahead. The motorcyclist on the right side is moving forward, potentially causing the self-driving vehicle to be cautious.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white sedan, approximately 2 meters away, moving forward. 2) Front-right: A white SUV, approximately 3 meters away, moving forward. 3) Left: A blue truck, approximately 1 meter away, moving forward. 4) Right: A motorcyclist, approximately 1 meter away, moving forward.
